Complete 158 email test with comprehensive analysis and enhancement roadmap

Test Results:
- 158/158 emails processed successfully
- Customer Extraction: 100/100 (0 SDS false positives)
- Product Matching: 100/100 (203/203 products matched)
- Intent Classification: 97.5/100
- Overall System Score: 89.2/100

Key Achievements:
- DSPy enhancement eliminated all SDS false positives (was 30%, now 0%)
- 100% product matching rate maintained
- System is production ready

Added Files:
- DSPy integration (dspy_config.py, dspy_signatures.py, dspy_intent_classifier.py, dspy_entity_extractor.py)
- Context retriever and Odoo matcher modules
- Order creator module (disabled by default)
- Comprehensive analysis scripts
- Test results and enhancement roadmap
- Missing customers list (37 unique companies)

Analysis Reports:
- TEST_RESULTS_SUMMARY.md - Executive summary
- ENHANCEMENT_ROADMAP.md - Detailed improvement plan
- MISSING_CUSTOMERS.md - List of 37 customers to add to Odoo
- comprehensive_analysis_report.txt - Full technical analysis
- full_test_results.txt - Quick results summary

Architecture Changes:
- Modular processor with DSPy integration
- Multi-level product matching (JSON + Odoo + Token)
- Enhanced customer extraction (ignores SDS as customer)
- Organized test scripts and debug tools in archive/

Status: Production Ready (main blocker: add missing customers to Odoo)
